name: The Painter (AnonymousCat)
description:
A short, text-based horror game inspired by Lovecraft's short story "The Pickman's Model." 

"You are an urban explorer who decided to take an abandoned workshop as the next location to explore. The workshop has a haunted reputation, but hey. Ghosts and monsters aren't real, so what's the harm in investigating it?"

This game has a total of 7 endings.

All of this was made by a single person in a span of a month. 

(I'm not a native english speaker so do forgive any grammar/spelling mistakes.)
